'''Radiant Spincrystal 118''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Magick Without Tears]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in the [[Orthant of Persona]].
